entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
